outputs.output_descr: The project seeks to  build the capacity of the Ministry of Women Affairs , Gender and Community Development to effectively play is coordination role in gender mainstreaming in  the country efficiently and effectively  through support in  review and formulation of the gender policy and other sector policies , support to  strategies to  increase opportunities for women to participate in the economy , support to the GEPMI roll out, support the participation of women in politics and decision making  and support in  gender equality monitoring,  evaluation and reporting .

project_descr: Strengthening National Gender Machinery - Gender Equality and Women Empowerment
